Html:
I am not sure if this is possible, I wasn't able to find a way, and maybe I am thinking about this all wrong because I'm new to MVVM, silverlight and WPF, but I was wondering if another overload could be added to the messenger send method that would accomidate a class that implements IComparer so that the token can be a complex type.

Let me know if this is posted in the wrong location. I've never posted anything to CodePlex, so I'm not sure this is the correct place for this suggestion.

Thank you!

Hi,

It's an interesting idea. I added it to the backlog.

Yes this is definitely a good place for suggestions!

Cheers
Laurent
